name: Morondanga Republik: Sisters at Summer Carnival
description:
Every year the Morondanga Republik celebrates the Summer Carnival where people ask the sky for rain. 

The costumes are varied and colorful: Peppos, Dead Queens, strange plants, non-existent animals, historical characters, big masks. 

Many people work all year long on their costumes and look forward to this event. It usually rains after the carnival. There are also those who say that the fruits are filled with flies. But the latter is unprovable.

Flora Márquez - 2021
